reviews.content: Some app icons disappears and can not be tapped. Even disabling tweak still causes icon disappearance. Besides the issue tweak is awesome!
I have a problem that makes all the icons on the first page not clickable, so I gotta swipe to next page then come back for them to work.
Amazing tweak. Lock Screen never been so spicy. Sad it might affect battery but it can be worth it!  iPhone 8 14.3.
there were a few bugs at first but they are fixed now just make sure to get the updated version. working on ios 14.3
